caseTitle: Water & Power Development Authority (WAPDA) thr. its Chairman, WAPDA House, Lahore & others v. Raja Iftikhar Ahmed
tagline: The conduct of the petitioner-department (WAPDA) of not implementing the judgment of the court is deprecated and special cost of Rs.50,000/- is imposed on the Chairman of WAPDA to be paid by him out of his own pocket.
